name: Long Night Alight
desc: Flins's specialty. Delicate fish slices shimmer with a gemstonesque, translucent, orange-red glow. A woody, smoky aroma complements the freshness of the fish like the gentle strains of classical music. The precision in heat control reveals a mastery of the culinary arts â€” a true representation of Flins's abilities.

value.text: Restores 16% of Max HP and an additional 1,350 HP to the selected character.
